item.description:
Let's see Steven Spielberg's "Lincoln" starring Daniel Day-Lewis. The film focuses on the last four months of Lincoln's life, particularly the political collision of Lincoln and the powerful men of his cabinet on the road to abolition and the end of the Civil War.

Movie starts 3:15, there is a TGIF restaurant in this strip mall we can head to if people want to discuss movie afterwards

Hope to see you there!

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Sunday Afternoon Matinee "Lincoln" in (Methuen)
